Indicted for the Murder of John Hill , an Infant of about half a year
kept a publick House in St. Martins Parish , where of a Sunday night
Wednesday after about eight at night , came
confess 'd himself Guilty . [ Death . See summary . ] Lewis Jones an old Man of above Fourscore years
